languages.text: Этот преданный защитник с готовностью подчиняется Неоспоримым приказам и Совету старика Равора.
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's Unquestionable Orders and Old Dog's Advice.

traits.locale_text: Этот преданный защитник с готовностью подчиняется Неоспоримым приказам и Совету старика Равора.

languages.text: 这位忠诚的守卫随时愿意接受雷沃的{g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}严格命令{/g}与{g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}老舵手的忠告{/g}。
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unquestionable Order{/g} and {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Old Dog's Advice{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这位忠诚的守卫随时愿意接受雷沃的严格命令与老舵手的忠告。

languages.text: このロイヤルディフェンダーはラヴォアの絶対的命令と老犬のアドバイスに即座に従う。
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's Unquestionable Orders and Old Dog's Advice.

traits.locale_text: このロイヤルディフェンダーはラヴォアの絶対的命令と老犬のアドバイスに即座に従う。

languages.text: Este defensor fiel obedece las {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Órdenes incuestionables{/g} y el {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Consejo de perro viejo{/g} de Ravor sin dudar.
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unquestionable Order{/g} and {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Old Dog's Advice{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este defensor fiel obedece las Órdenes incuestionables y el Consejo de perro viejo de Ravor sin dudar.

languages.text: Dieser loyale Verteidiger gehorcht bereitwillig Ravors {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unzweifelhaften Befehlen{/g} und {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Rat eines alten Hundes{/g}.
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unquestionable Order{/g} and {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Old Dog's Advice{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dieser loyale Verteidiger gehorcht bereitwillig Ravors Unzweifelhaften Befehlen und Rat eines alten Hundes.

languages.text: Ce loyal défenseur répond volontiers aux {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Ordres incontestables{/g} de Ravor et aux {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Conseils du vieux loup de mer{/g}.
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unquestionable Order{/g} and {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Old Dog's Advice{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce loyal défenseur répond volontiers aux Ordres Incontestables de Ravor et aux Conseils du Vieux Loup de Mer.

languages.text: Bu sadık savunucu, Ravor'un {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Sorgulanamaz Emir{/g} ve {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Yaşlı Kurdun Tavsiyesi{/g} kabiliyetlerine hemen itaat eder.
languages.original_text: This loyal defender readily obeys Ravor's {g|f:df3bcd18c8ae4aea8032d53a58706345}Unquestionable Order{/g} and {g|f:32c75d8efde14a788225367fbf570bcf}Old Dog's Advice{/g}.
